title: Nevada smart city: A millionaire’s plan to create a local government
description: Jeffrey Berns wants to build a tech oasis in the Nevada desert. Do others share his utopian vision?

title: Why Australian women are saying 'enough is enough'
description: Australian politics is often called toxic to women - now rape allegations have ignited national fury.

title: Bedfordshire: Army officer restores WW2 'secret garden' at Chicksands Priory
description: The garden at Chicksands Priory was used by code-breakers in World War Two but had been neglected.

title: Lingard, Stones & Shaw recalled for England's World Cup qualifiers
description: England boss Gareth Southgate recalls Jesse Lingard, John Stones and Luke Shaw to his squad for 2022 World Cup qualifiers later this month.

title: Covid vaccine: Supply issues will not delay second doses - Hancock
description: The health secretary confirms the UK's supply is being hit by a delayed AstraZeneca shipment from India.

title: Backlash grows against cut to electric car grants
description: A government decision to reduce subsidies is criticised by the motor industry and UK businesses.

title: Cheltenham punter wins at least £250,000 from £5 bet
description: A punter has won £250,000 from a £5 bet after deciding to cash out on the final leg of his accumulator at Cheltenham.

title: BBC to move key jobs and programmes out of London
description: The corporation is expanding out of the capital to "ensure every household gets value from the BBC".

title: Sexual assault: 'One in 40' young women experience it each year
description: The number of offences police record is "well below" the estimated number of victims, the ONS says.

title: Economic outlook 'unusually uncertain' despite 'rapid' vaccine rollout
description: Bank of England says recovery depends on the "evolution of the pandemic" despite the "rapid" vaccine rollout.

title: Evha Jannath: Ex Drayton Manor operator fined £1m after ride death
description: Evha Jannath's death at Drayton Manor was an "utterly tragic waste of a young life", the judge says.

title: Caroline Flack documentary: 'A compassionate eulogy'
description: Critics largely praise the Channel 4 documentary about the presenter's life and death.

title: England's Daly replaces injured Slade for Ireland game
description: England's Elliot Daly will replace the injured Henry Slade against Ireland in Saturday's Six Nations match, making his first international start at outside centre since 2016.

title: Beard back for Wales' Grand Slam trip to France
description: Coach Wayne Pivac recalls lock Adam Beard in the only change to his side as Wales aim to complete the Six Nations Grand Slam against France.

title: Kobe Bryant widow sues LA police over 'graphic images' of helicopter crash
description: Vanessa Bryant published the names of officers she says shared photos of the site of Bryant's death.

title: John Magufuli: Tanzania's president dies aged 61 after Covid rumours
description: Covid-sceptic John Magufuli had not been seen in public for more than two weeks.

title: BT's Openreach to build full-fibre internet 'like fury' after Ofcom move
description: Regulator Ofcom will not cap Openreach's fees for full-fibre connections for at least 10 years.

title: Drag Race UK finalists reveal their best and worst moments
description: Bimini, Tayce, Lawrence and Ellie discuss the ways that being on the show has changed their lives.

title: The Papers: EU will 'grab your jabs' and tough migrant stance
description: A UK-EU row over Covid vaccine supply leads many papers, while new asylum seeker rules also feature.

title: Rebound therapy: The zero-gravity exercise that gets children screaming 'more'
description: Trampolines can be fun, but for those with physical and learning difficulties they can also offer a gravity-free way to exercise.

title: Paris Commune: The revolt dividing France 150 years on
description: Passions flare over how to remember the city's brief, much-romanticised experiment in power to the people.

title: Asia's richest man, a bomb scare and a murder in India
description: An explosives-laden car is found near Mukesh Ambani's home in Mumbai, and its alleged owner is killed.

title: Covid-19: Sister 'written off' by do-not-resuscitate order
description: Sonia Deleon's family say they would have disputed the order had they known it was put in place.

title: Covid: How ethnicity and wealth affect US vaccine rollout
description: People belonging to ethnic minorities are less likely to have been vaccinated, despite being more likely to develop Covid.

title: Covid: From boom to bust - why lockdown hasn't led to more babies
description: Research shows that the US and parts of Europe are facing slumps in birth rates.

title: In pictures: Hidden depths of a life lived
description: Photographer Laura Page challenges the stereotypes of age.

title: 'We need to reflect on why women still do most of the childcare'
description: After a year of pandemic and lockdowns, mothers are still doing most of the childcare, a report shows.

title: Edward Colston: Bristol's Dolphin School changed its emblem
description: Bristol's Dolphin School has redesigned their emblem because of its association with Edward Colston.
